summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via updates to App.tsx (removing nested QueryClientProvider) and Portfolio.tsx (explicit error state + retry). REQ-3 (actual redeploy) is not evidenced by code diff; only a deployment guide was added. Several additional, unrequested content/UI/back-end data changes are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redeploy the application after implementing the loading fix so the draft preview no longer gets stuck loading and the deployed version renders the portfolio sections successfully.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code/documentation changes, but no evidence of an actual build/deploy being performed or deployment artifacts/config updates that demonstrate a completed redeploy and verified preview behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend portfolio content/data model changes (new/updated types and seeded hardcoded content such as experiences/about/social links).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on frontend React Query provider usage and frontend loading UX; it does not request changing backend portfolio schemas/content.
REQ-3 asks to redeploy; it does not request adding new documentation files.

hallucinated_features.description: Seeding backend with a profile image and exactly 5 personal projects via DataInitializer (and related portfolio content expectations).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly say not to add new portfolio content/projects; this is additional content behavior beyond resolving loading reliability.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader UI/theme changes (e.g., purple-themed OKLCH color system, gaming aesthetic tokens) and additional UI element changes described in summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals disallow redesign beyond what is needed to resolve the loading issue; these appear to be design/theme changes not required for loading reliability.
